hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select concat('HC', :year, '/', ifnull(max(cast(substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned)), 0) + 1) from heatchartmaster where substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 3, 2) = :year

select * from heatchartmaster where cast(substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) between cast(substring(substring_index(:fromHcNumber, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) and cast(substring(substring_index(:toHcNumber, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) and substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 3, 2) = substring(substring_index(:fromHcNumber, '-', 1), 3, 2) order by cast(substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) asc

select * from heatchartmaster where cast(substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) >= cast(substring(substring_index(:fromHcNumber, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) and substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 3, 2) = substring(substring_index(:fromHcNumber, '-', 1), 3, 2) order by cast(substring(substring_index(Chart_Number, '-', 1), 6) as unsigned) asc
